the india pakistan border ceremony takes
place daily at the attari wagah border just

before
sunset the military event is performed

by india's border security force and the
pakistan rangers and is something that

has been done
since 1959. technically the whole

purpose behind the ceremony is to lower
the national flag and officially close

the border for the night
however what takes place is a lively

display featuring marching
stomping and plenty of high kicks while

the crowd cheers and breaks into song
and dance

it's energetic it's theatrical and it's
an event you cannot miss whether you

find yourself
traveling in amritsar or across the
border in neighboring lahore
